Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    Interface used by AIs to return a move based on a given board state
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Backend that contains the board representation, handles turns while telling GUI to update based on the changed board Also handles AI moves
    ColumnButton
    Class handles each column of the connect 4 board
    Connect4
    Main system starts GUI
    ExpertAI
    Expert AI with extensive analysis on future turns described further in methods
    GUIBoard
    Class holds all GUI objects and handles main GUI function Notifies backend of changes to game state
    IntermediateAI
    Intermediate AI class which is a simplified version of the Expert AI
    NoviceAI
    Novice AI looks at the next possible move for itself and the opponent, as well as the last move made by the opponent and makes a move based on those factors.
    Settings
    Setting takes in the user's choice of theme and opponent
    SideBar
    This is a menu side bar which contains a information about the game state, drop down menus to alter settings and a new game button When a NEW GAME is created (After New Game Button): Call gameSettings.revealStatus(); Call this.nextPlayer(0); When a game ends: Call gameSettings.hideStatus(); To Find out the Opponent Type for NEW GAME: Call gameSettings.getOpponent(); Will give 0 - 3.
    StatusBar
    The Status bar lets the user know who's turn is currently in play.
    Token
    Representation of Board tokens
